title: Dr Rashel Vitamin C Brightening And Anti-Aging Day Cream With Niacinamide | Hydrating Face Moisturizer For Glowing Skin ? 50g
description:
Description
Dr Rashel Vitamin C Brightening And Anti-Aging Day Cream With Niacinamide | Hydrating Face Moisturizer For Glowing Skin ? 50g

Dr Rashel Vitamin C Brightening And Anti-Aging Day Cream Is A Luxurious Skincare Essential That Combines The Power Of Vitamin C And Niacinamide To Revitalize Your Skin. This Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing Formula Helps Brighten Dull Skin, Fade Dark Spots, And Reduce Fine Lines For A Healthy, Youthful Glow. Enriched With Powerful Antioxidants, It Protects Against Environmental Damage While Keeping Your Skin Deeply Hydrated And Smooth. Ideal For Daily Use, This Cream Works Perfectly Under Makeup And Leaves The Skin Fresh, Soft, And Luminous.

Key Features:

Infused With Vitamin C And Niacinamide For Skin Brightening

Reduces Fine Lines, Wrinkles, And Dark Spots

Deeply Moisturizes And Hydrates The Skin

Promotes Even Skin Tone And Natural Glow

Lightweight, Non-Greasy Formula Perfect For Daily Use

Provides Antioxidant Protection Against Free Radicals

Suitable For All Skin Types

Net Weight: 50 Grams

Quality Original
